title: Kyuubi1337 Ban
body:

can you post the reform card?
actually based on your comment before it might be due to suspicious account activity and they just locked your account temporarily.

Did you have any prior punishments? The punishment system works in 4 tiers:

10 game chat restriction
25 game chat restriction
14 day suspension
permanent suspension

Anything that can get you a chat restriction can get you a perma ban if you go through the tiers, you can also skip tiers through extreme toxicity.

If you would like me to check your logs and see if anything in them could cause you to skip punishment tiers or are just unsure of why you were punished in general you can post your logs. If you think you were punished unjustly you can submit a support ticket to have your punishment manually reviewed, however they will only overturn punishments that were issued in error.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Contact Riot Support via their page (Click the support buttons at the top or bottom of this page) if you're not sure why you received it. 

Also, more info please. 

If it was for Behavior, you should've received a reform card upon logging in/via email. 

If it was for use of cheats/scripts/third party modification, it should say something to that effect.

If it just gives an absurdly far away year and nothing else, it probably means they locked it due to suspicious log-in activity or chargebacks on purchases. Contact Riot support to go about getting log-in access back (securing your account or paying back what is owed)
